document.title: Console Utility Functions
document.synopsis: Functions used by various Oyster console applications

function.name: process_args
function.synopsis: Quick and dirty command line argument processing. This treats any string prefixed with - or -- as a 'key' and any string directly after it as a value for that key. If no key is available, the value is stored with the key ''.
function.note: If you include config.pl (or it was included for you), you do not need to call this, the results will be stored in %oyster::config::args.
